heading: HR00206
0: A RESOLUTION FOR THE APPROPRIATE COMMITTEE TO LOOK INTO AND PRESCRIBE REMEDIAL MEASURES TO THE LOOPHOLE ON RA 10533 ENTITLED 'AN ACT ENHANCING THE PHILIPPINE BASIC EDUCATION SYSTEM BY STRENGTHENING ITS CURRICULUM AND INCREASING THE NUMBER OF YEARS FOR BASIC EDUCATION, APPROPRIATING FUNDS THEREFOR AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES,' OTHERWISE KNOWN AS THE 'ENHANCED BASIC EDUCATION ACT OF 2013,' WHICH APPEARS TO HAVE OVERLOOKED THE CONSIDERABLE TOLL ON COLLEGE TEACHERS OF THE TRANSITION FROM GRADES 11 TO 12 TO COLLEGE
status: Pending with the Committee on BASIC EDUCATION AND CULTURE since 2016-09-19
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HR00206
FULL TITLE : A RESOLUTION FOR THE APPROPRIATE COMMITTEE TO LOOK INTO AND PRESCRIBE REMEDIAL MEASURES TO THE LOOPHOLE ON RA 10533 ENTITLED 'AN ACT ENHANCING THE PHILIPPINE BASIC EDUCATION SYSTEM BY STRENGTHENING ITS CURRICULUM AND INCREASING THE NUMBER OF YEARS FOR BASIC EDUCATION, APPROPRIATING FUNDS THEREFOR AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES,' OTHERWISE KNOWN AS THE 'ENHANCED BASIC EDUCATION ACT OF 2013,' WHICH APPEARS TO HAVE OVERLOOKED THE CONSIDERABLE TOLL ON COLLEGE TEACHERS OF THE TRANSITION FROM GRADES 11 TO 12 TO COLLEGE
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : CASTELO, WINSTON "WINNIE"
DATE FILED : 2016-08-10
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON BASIC EDUCATION AND CULTURE ON 2016-09-19
PREVIOUS COMMITTEE REFERRALS :PRIMARILY REFERRED TO RULES on 2016-08-17;
